data.message: You all make me sick, immediately trying to bring attention back to the Israeli-Palestinian conflict: the most complicated issue in the world. Which inadvertently has nothing to do with the attacks in France (unless the terrorists were Palestinian radicals). So to all the people here complaining that "Palestine", Syria and other known terrorist occupied areas aren't getting attention, stop....because they are getting plenty attention in the media. In many shapes and forms. Stop blaming the people at Facebook and Mark Zuckerberg for the worlds problems.

Oh so you mean the palestinians ?

Dont worry im not trying to convince you to support palestine, im just exposing your racism and hate for the innocent.

I never said Palestinians are terrorists, in fact, in a way most Palestinians are victim to terrorism. Their land is occupied heavily by Hamas who is consistently bombing Israel, they hide in Palestinian schools and hospitals, so when the Israelis retaliate against the bombers, innocent lives are victim. It's so sick. Also, Palestinian leaders are on the record of condoning VIOLENCE. Israel has been consistently and unfairly having to DEFEND themselves for almost 70 years. They were granted statehood but the surrounding countries refused to accept it. It's fact that they needed a place to live in which they're willing to defend.... don't call me a racist, I'm against violence period.

How do you expect palestinians to stay quiet and surrender to the occuption? How can you live under oppression and racism ? I suggest you start learning about whats really going on there, instead of saying israel are defending themselves, do you actually believe that palestinians and israeli people are equal under the false statehood of israel ? My friend if you are against violence i advise you to stop getting your news from biased media outlest like fox who are run by rupert murdoch.
